trans-unit.source: The Mirari pulses in his veins.
trans-unit.target: 映奇宝珠在他血中悸动。

trans-unit.source: Timberwatch Elf

trans-unit.source: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.
trans-unit.target: 在映奇宝珠的喧扰声中，地精依旧能听见族人的呼唤。

trans-unit.source: Totem Speaker
trans-unit.target: 图腾述师

trans-unit.source: Whenever a Beast comes into play, you may gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个野兽进场时，你可以获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Elves and beasts are tied together, and I am the knot that binds them."
trans-unit.target: 「地精与野兽的命运相连，而我正是两条线中的绳结。」

trans-unit.source: Tribal Forcemage
trans-unit.target: 部族力法师

trans-unit.source: Morph {1}{G} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Tribal Forcemage is turned face up, creatures of the type of your choice get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 变身{一}{绿}（你可牌面朝下地使用此牌并支付{三}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。） 当部族力法师翻回正面时，选择一种生物类别，该类别的生物得+2/+2并获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Vexing Beetle can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 恼人甲虫不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: LGN·143 | Vexing Beetle | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Vexing Beetle gets +3/+3 as long as no opponent controls a creature.
trans-unit.target: 只要所有对手均未操控生物，恼人甲虫便得+3/+3。

trans-unit.source: As the Mirari's mutating effects grew out of control, centaurs and druids fled—but insects swarmed closer.
trans-unit.target: 当映奇宝珠的变异力量逐渐失去控制后，半人马与德鲁伊纷纷逃走～但昆虫反而飞得更近。

trans-unit.source: Wirewood Channeler
trans-unit.target: 修索林通递人

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Elves in play.
trans-unit.target: {横置}：加X点任意颜色的单色法术力到你的法术力池中，X为场上地精的数量。

trans-unit.source: "Your words are meaningless. The rustling of leaves is the only language that makes any sense."
trans-unit.target: 「你们的言语没有意义。叶间的沙沙声是唯一有意义的语言。」

trans-unit.source: Wirewood Hivemaster
trans-unit.target: 修索林御虫师

trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken Elf comes into play, you may put a 1/1 green Insect creature token into play.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的地精进场时，你可以将一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: "Most insects have been drawn to the Mirari. But all that remain in Wirewood are under my care."
trans-unit.target: 「大多数昆虫都被映奇宝珠吸引而去。但留在修索林的都由我照料。」
